name: Fallen London: Factory of Favours
storyline: One of Iron and Misery's factories has gone silent. Learn why, negotiate with Clay Men, and bargain with Rattus Faber. Untangle the web that snarls the forces of industry and determine the factory's fate!
summary: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for February, 2018. Third and final entry in the Season of Silver.
